D_heating_network.description: Distance between the centerlines of the supply and return pipelines

D_cooling_network.description: Distance between the centerlines of the supply and return pipelines

life_time.description: lifetime of the heating/cooling network and its components

asphaltlayer.description: consideration of asphalt layer? 1 = yes, 0 = no

k_soil.description: soil heat conductivity. Source: Median value from table 4.1 Wessolek, G. (2022). Parametrisierung thermischer Bodeneigenschaften: Endbericht

k_PUF.description: Polyurethane foam heat conductivity. Source: VDI Wärmeatlas

h_loss_subst.description: Heat losses at the substation. Source: Technikkatalog Wärmeplanung 2024

C_subst.description: Invest. for the substation; Source: Technikkatalog Wärmeplanung 2024

C_O&M.description: Variable O&M costs; Source: Technikkatalog Wärmeplanung 2024
